department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Degree of Master of Arts in Regional Studies - East Asia
department.dept_short_name: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia

course.course_group: Regional Studies _ Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
course.title: Master's Thesis Development and Writing
course.faculty_text: Alexandra Mary Vacroux and members of the Faculty
course.description: A continuation of RSRA 298/298hf, culminating in the final master's thesis.
course.notes: May be substituted for RSRA299hf only with the permission of the Academic Advisor. Master's degree candidates normally complete both *RSRA 298hf/298 and 299hf/299 to fulfill the thesis requirement. Course must be taken for letter grade.
